entry.title: Learn German
entry.content:
The Alphabet

A to Z, plus the following:

  • Ä ä
  • Ö ö
  • Ü ü
  • ß

SCH

  • Fisch: fish

EI

  • Eis: ice
  • Reis: rice

AU

  • Haus: house
  • Maus: mouse

W

Pronounced [v]

  • Wolf: wolf
  • Wagen: car

V

Pronounced [f]

  • Volk: people
  • Volkswagen

Z

Pronounced [ts]

  • Zeit: time
  • Schweiz: Switzerland

CH

ACH

  • Nacht: night
  • machen: make

OCH

  • Woche: week

UCH

  • Buch: book

AUCH

  • auch: also

all other CH

  • ich: I
  • mich: me
  • Licht: light
  • Milch: milk
  • München: Munich

entry.title: Web Development
entry.content:
Hosting

  • Heroku
  • GitHub Pages
  • Engine Yard
  • Google App Engine
  • Windows Azure
  • Amazon Web Services
  • OpenShift

Editor

  • Dillinger
  • StackEdit
  • Cloud 9 Ace
  • Brackets
  • CodePen
  • JS Bin

Static Site

  • Jekyll
  • Octopress
  • Harp

Web Framework

  • Sinatra
  • Padrino
  • Node.js
  • Dart
  • Play
  • Grape
  • ASP.NET MVC
  • Spring
  • Merb
  • Tapestry

Lightweight CMS

Frontend Framework
